nodes.description: 1992年以色列驻布宜诺斯艾利斯使馆遭汽车炸弹袭击，29人死亡，案件至今未破
nodes.support_text: The 1992 bombing of the Israeli embassy in Buenos Aires - in which 29 people died - has also never been solved.

nodes.description: 1994年阿根廷最大犹太社区遭遇汽车炸弹袭击，85人死亡、200余人受伤
nodes.support_text: The explosion - the result of a car bomb - left 85 people dead, more than 200 injured...

nodes.description: 2001年9月针对1994年袭击的审判在强化安保的特别法庭正式开庭
nodes.support_text: More than 1,200 witnesses have testified in a specially fortified court since the trial opened in September 2001.

nodes.description: 2003年8月英国逮捕伊朗前驻阿根廷大使索莱曼普尔，引发伊朗与阿根廷、英国的外交争端
nodes.support_text: Britain is holding a former Iranian diplomat The former ambassador, Hade Soleimanpour, was arrested in the UK on 21 August...

nodes.description: 阿根廷前总统梅内姆否认掩盖真相，但承认存在瑞士秘密银行账户
nodes.support_text: Menem denies a cover-up The politician, Carlos Menem, denies the accusation - but admitted he had a secret Swiss bank account...

nodes.description: 2004年新总统基什内尔公开1994年案件情报档案，解除情报人员作证禁令
nodes.support_text: He opened Argentine intelligence files on the case shortly after taking office in the spring. He also effectively lifted a decree...

nodes.description: 阿根廷司法系统认定伊朗通过驻阿使馆支持袭击者，伊朗予以否认
nodes.support_text: The accusation is that the Iranian embassy in Buenos Aires aided those who planned the attack - allegedly Middle Eastern guerrillas backed by Iran.

nodes.description: 5名受审阿根廷人被指控提供实施1994年袭击的汽车
nodes.support_text: Five of the Argentines on trial are accused of knowingly providing the attackers with the vehicle used in the bombing.

nodes.description: 累计1200余名证人参与1994年案件审理，持续两年未宣判
nodes.support_text: More than nine years later, the community still feels it has not received justice. Warrants Israel and the United States agree...

nodes.description: 1994年袭击的AMIA犹太社区中心完成重建
nodes.support_text: The AMIA centre has been rebuilt.

nodes.description: 阿根廷司法系统认定伊朗通过驻阿使馆支持袭击者
nodes.support_text: The accusation is that the Iranian embassy in Buenos Aires aided those who planned the attack - allegedly Middle Eastern guerrillas backed by Iran.

nodes.description: Nestor Kirchner称未结案调查是国耻
